channel.title: Module 3 on HIST1900A
channel.description: Recent content in Module 3 on HIST1900A

item.title: Module 3 Communicating
item.description: In this final module, you will try to find the compelling story and to communicate it, in various ways, to your intended public. To whom does archaeology belong? Does it matter how we tell the story? Each week, you have tasks, readings, and or things to listen to/watch that I would like you to complete. These should be done -or at least attempted- before moving onto the next week.

item.title: Module 4 The Victorian Internet
item.description: Telegraphy, Telephony Babbage, Lovelace, Jacquard Semaphores Codes, Ciphers and whatever other early things seem relevant
